code:
%%{Groupware_ChatRoom}}}%%
gantt
    title erlmcp Quality Gates - Build Pipeline (Groupware_SprintBacklog)
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm
    axisFormat %H:%M

    section Pre-Commit (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    Code Formatting              :active, p1, 2026-01-31 00:00, 5m
    Linting (Groupware_SprintBacklog)    :crit, p2, after p1, 10m
    Type Checking (Groupware_KanbanBoard)     :crit, p3, after p2, 15m
    Security Scan (Groupware_IssueTracker)       :crit, p4, after p3, 10m

    section Compilation (Groupware_WikiPage)
    rebar3 compile               :crit, comp1, 2026-01-31 00:40, 10m
    Xref Analysis                :comp2, after comp1, 5m

    section Unit Testing (Groupware_ChatRoom)
    EUnit Tests                  :crit, test1, after comp2, 20m
    Coverage Analysis (Groupware_ChatRoom)     :crit, test2, after test1, 5m

    section Integration Testing (Groupware_ChatRoom)
    CommonTest Suites            :crit, integ1, after test2, 30m
    Property-Based (Groupware_WikiPage)      :integ2, after integ1, 15m

    section Performance (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    Benchmarking (Groupware_KanbanBoard)    :bench1, after integ2, 15m
    Regression Analysis (Groupware_IssueTracker)   :crit, bench2, after bench1, 5m

    section Compliance (Groupware_IssueTracker)
    Compliance Report Generation :comp1, 2026-01-31 02:00, 10m
    Evidence Bundle Creation     :crit, comp2, after comp1, 10m
    Release Certification        :milestone, comp3, after comp2, 0m
